participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Emily has a deep appreciation for the arts and a strong sense of empathy. She often reflects on her experiences and values meaningful connections with others.
participant_1.background: I adopted all my dogs. I believe in karma. I love to read. I have never been on a date. I once wrote a biography of my favorite actor.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and sociable, Jake enjoys engaging in lively discussions and sharing his interests. He has a playful side and loves to explore new activities.
participant_2.background: My favorite color is red. I work as an accountant. My favorite food is a burger. I like to play tennis. My favorite musical is Hamilton.

content.text: Me too! It's a powerful force.
I once wrote a biography of my favorite actor.
Wow, that's really cool! Who was your favorite actor?
It was Robin Williams. He was such a talented and funny man.
I love Robin Williams! He was one of my favorites too.
I'm glad I'm not the only one. He was such a great actor.
He was. I'm so sad that he's gone.
Me too. He will be missed.
Have you seen any of his movies lately?
I just watched Jumanji the other day. It was so good!
I love that movie! It's so funny.
Me too! It's one of my favorites.
What's your favorite thing about it?
I love the way Robin Williams plays Alan. He's so funny and lovable.
Me too! He's such a great actor.
I'm glad we agree. He's one of the best.
I'm glad you like him too. He's one of my favorites.
